title: its impossible to tank magic damage anymore. MR tank items are fucking garbage
body:
the MR items are worthless. am playing a tank that can't use abysall well. what other choices I have? I build a fucking merc treads, and a fucking spirit visage, and a fucking adaptive helm. and after all of that shit. I only have ~160 MR. you know how much will I lose against a mage build

160-40% from voidstaff = 96 MR. 

95-18 from mpen boots=  78 MR

78 -15 from  morellos= 63


63 fucking MR. let me repeat that. if I can't build abyssal and I build all of the MR items I can build on a tanky champion. I end up with 63 god forsaken MR against the mage builds these days.


sick and tired of losing 1500 HP to the enemy support that build Mpen boots and morellos before mid game. its fucking silly.  don't need ad carries when "supports" have access to ridiculous itemization that lets them vastly outdamage any ad carry. even late game. I'd take a mage over an adc.

replies.body: Sadly every Tank is fking garbage.

At least AP champs dont have the absurd amount of true damage that AD champs have, let alone sources of armor shredding all while having normal armor pen items and 35% on Lord Dominik's (less than void staff but auto attacks and abilities vs jst abilities with AP).

At this point, damage just needs to go back a huge notch. Tanks should be able to absorb lots of damage and damage dealers shouldn't be able to take lots of it.

It shouldn't be where a mage that's 2 kills behind can kill a 3000 HP tank that has 180 MR in 3 spells. It's ridiculous.

Penetration + defensive items need a rework.

it's impossible to tank anything
why do you think tanks are extinct

A mage that is 4 items into their build SHOULD be able to deal damage. You still have adaptive helm and a huge HP pool in any case, allowing you to shrug off some of their damage. If mages couldn't deal damage to tanks nobody would play them.
Damage outscales resistances. But you don't buy void staff second item.
